from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.window import *
data1=[(1,"kanit",'M',1000),(2,"Dev",'F',1000),(3,"Ani",' ',3000)]
schema1=["id","name",'gender','salary']
df=spark.createDataFrame(data=data1,schema=schema1)
df.show()
df.select(approx_count_distinct('salary')).show()
df.select(count('salary')).show()
df.select(countDistinct('salary')).show()
df.select(avg('salary')).show()
df.select(collect_list('salary')).show()
df.select(collect_set('salary')).show()

from pyspark.sql import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import *
data1=[(1,"kanit",'M',1000,'HR'),(2,"Dev",'F',2000,'IT'),(3,"Ani",'M',3000,'Account'),\
        (4,"Ankit",'M',4000,'Account'),(5,"Hari",'M',1000,'Account'),(6,"meera",'F',2000,'HR'),\
        (7,"Anil",'M',3000,'IT'),(8,"tarun",'M',4000,'IT'),(9,"Ketan",'M',4000,'IT')]
schema1=["id","name",'gender','salary','department']
df=spark.createDataFrame(data1,schema1)
df.show()
df.sort('department').show()
